findings.title: Bad work with decimals
findings.description: Hardcoded decimal values in the Claiming contract can lead to incorrect work with token amounts in the future.

findings.title: Incorrect work with decimals
findings.description: `DistributionEvent.totalTournamentEarnings` and `DistributionEvent.totalOtherEarnings` are stored for the current token's decimals. If the new token is set with an other number of decimals after the distribution is created, these variables will contain incorrect values.
